DOC.brief_summary: Safety/Efficacy 100-mg Viagra 8 hour post dose men mild moderate erectile dysfunction
DOC.brief_title: Mild To Moderate Erectile Dysfunction Study
DOC.criteria: Men 1870 year age Documented clinical diagnosis erectile dysfunction least 3 month duration . Subjects penile implant Subjects known history retinitis pigmentosa . Subjects , due requirement 100 mg dosage , receive concomitant treatment potent CYP3A4 inhibitor ritonavir .
